title: Spain: COVID-19 vaccination willingness by education level | Statista
author: J Mendoza; Jul 6
description: According to a survey carried out in Spain on July 2021, around 98 percent of respondents that had no studies and 74.6 percent of those with higher education had already been vaccinated against COVID-19.
